Description.Text: The Missing Lantern Guest House is in a Beautiful brownstone. We provide romantic getaways and offer travelers a quiet, discreet retreat with easy access to New York City shops and theatres. Come experience a great night sleep and enjoy the amenities of a luxurious room at prices that other luxury hotels cannot match. We offer affordable, first class, fully furnished, studio apartment suites, in a Brooklyn brownstone. Our stylish suites include a luxurious bath, one queen sized and one full sized bed, with elegant sheets and plush pillows, atop an irresistible mattress. All suites include a microwave, refrigerator, cable television and coffeemaker. Our suites are also self-help if you desire to prepare your own meals.We are also conveniently located near local restaurants and public transportation. We are The Missing Lantern Guest House, a place of elegance.Minimum age required at check-in is 21. Customers who book must call property at 1-718-771-6007 no later than 72 hours prior to arrival to obtain an access code for their unit. Failure to do so will result in cancellation of booking.Please call 1-718-771-6007 72 hours before check-in to receive check-in procedures. There is a minimum security deposit of USD 200.00, which will be returned once guest checks out of room and inspections are done. Extra person fee- USD 60.00 nightly per person fee. Fee waived for children 0-13 years old if additional bed is not requested. Customers who book must call property at 1-718-771-6007 no later than 72 hours prior to arrival to obtain an access code for their unit. Failure to do so will result in cancellation of booking.

The heart of this charming eclectic neighborhood offers tree-lined streets full of shopping, beautiful Victorian homes, and a lively jazz and dining scene. The Brooklyn Museum of Art is nearby. This is the perfect destination for a romantic getaway.

Captain molly suite - This very large and comfortable suite has a washer and dryer, a backyard, a living room, and a dining room. It includes a kitchen and plenty of room for a couple wanting some romantic time together, or a family with children. It is also wifi and cable ready.
George washington suite - This lovely Suite is fully furnished with a queen sized bed and a twin sized sofa bed. It has a private patio and a full kitchen, a full bathroom. It is also WiFi and cable ready.
Stain glass suite - This suite is fully furnished with a queen sized bed and a single sized sofa bed. It has a kitchen, a private bathroom with double head shower. It is also WiFi and cable ready.
The tropical suite - This gorgeous suite is fully furnished. It has a queen sized bed and a queen sized sofa bed. It has a kitchen and a private bathroom. It is also WiFi and cable ready.
The Jefferson Suite - This suite is extremely large. It is fully furnished with a queen sized bed, a queen sized sofa bed, a double bed, and a futon. It has a full kitchen and a private large bathroom. It has a computer room and it is WiFi and cable ready.
James armistead suite - Fully furnished 1 bedroom, 1 private bath suite with one queen sized bed and one double sofa bed. It is fully equipped with a private kitchen and mini bar. Also this lovely suite is WiFi and cable ready.
The asian fusion suite - The asian fusion suite
The blues room - This lovely suite is fully furnished. It has a queen sized bed and a queen sized sofa bed. It has a large kitchen and a private large bathroom with neon lights. It is WiFi and cable ready.
